recommendations: Jash Mehta “Khush has been an invaluable resource as I embarked on my entrepreneurial journey with GM Consulting. He generously offered his time on a pro bono basis, helping me navigate key areas like go-to-market strategy, pricing, and financial management. With his deep understanding of business dynamics, Khush made complex concepts easy to grasp and provided practical, data-backed insights that significantly impacted my decision-making. His approach to pricing and financial strategy was thoughtful and results-oriented, ensuring that each choice aligned with our long-term goals. Thanks to Khush’s support, I gained clarity and confidence in shaping the direction of my business.”

Kshitij Pimplikar “I had the pleasure of working alongside Khush in the past, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional professional. His analytical skills are truly outstanding, enabling him to dissect complex problems and derive insightful solutions.What sets Khush apart is his openness to feedback and his eagerness to embrace new challenges. He consistently demonstrates a dedicated team player mentality, always willing to collaborate and support his colleagues. His resilience and commitment to learning make him an invaluable asset. I highly recommend Khush for any opportunity that comes his way; his skills and attitude will undoubtedly contribute to any team's success.”
